description: Kaleido-Sapphire is the http://anidb.net/t2503 [magical girl] version of http://anidb.net/ch42327 [Luviagelita Edelfelt]. Luvia becomes Kaleido-Sapphire when she wields the http://anidb.net/ch54377 [Kaleidostick Sapphire], one of the inventions of http://anidb.net/ch40592 [Kischur Zelretch Schweinorg].
name: Kaleido-Sapphire
